1524327364_1GkmeCNuarifRQooJ8P5xawoXCweD.body: Your project is awesome. The whole point of bitcoin blockchain is immutability. You extended this nature to other type of data rather than only bitcoin ledger

> [coincloudguy](#comment_2_1GkmeCNuarifRQooJ8P5xawoXCweDdLrUJ): @qh2fmfoawrup7rb [...]
Hi, Thanks for the reference links. I thought the same thing for a while too. Even though bitcoin blockchain is expensive sometimes, but for people want this level of immutability is fine. Like telegram before, people have to shorten their message. 
I personally don't think file size limit is not a problem, because for people living in China, their words are under heavy censorship in all social media. These data stored in bitcoin blockchain cannot be deleted by government, that's a major success already. 
Of course I will try to spread your project! I think it has a lot of real world use cases!
